Statute.Title: Budget Implementation Act, 2019, No. 1
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Exécution du budget de 2019, Loi no 1 d’)

Minister.Text: General, 2019, c. 29, ss. 129- 132 (payments), 291 (purpose of Division 15) and 371

CoordinatingAmendment.Text: Coordinating amendments, 2019, c. 29, ss. 92, 151, 211 and 212, 268, 310, 376 to 381

Item.Text: — ss. 9(1) and 20(1) deemed in force 01.01.2009 see ss. 9(2) and 20(2)
— s. 17(1) deemed in force 17.10.2018 see s. 17(2)
— ss. 45 and 46 in force 01.03.2020 see SI/2020-21
— ss. 48(1) and 49(1) deemed in force 19.03.2019 see ss. 48(2) and 49(2)
— ss. 70(1) and 74(1) and (2) deemed in force 19.03.2019 see s. 70(2) and 74(3)
— ss. 93 to 96 (Subdivision B of Division 1 of Part 4) in force 02.04.2021 see s. 97 and SI/2021-12
— ss. 98 to 101 in force 13.06.2019 see s. 102
— s. 127 (Division 3) in force 01.01.2021 see SI/2020-72
— ss. 142 and 143(1) come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 152(1) — Not in force

— ss. 143(2) and (3) and 144 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council, but that day must not be before the first day on which both s. 142 and s. 143(1) are in force see s. 152(2) — Not in force
— ss. 145(2) and (3) and 147 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 152(3)
— ss. 153 and 154 in force 01.01.2020 see s. 155
— s. 196 in force on assent: 21.06.2019 see s. 197
— ss. 206 to 212 and 216 in force on assent 21.06.2019 see s. 213
— s. 217 to 221 in force on assent: 21.06.2019
— Division 10 of Part 4 (ss. 222 and 223) in force 10.07.2019 see SI/2019-64
— Division 11, (ss. 225-268) other than sections 259 to 265 and 268, and as below, come into force on a day or days to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 269(1)

— s. 242 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council, but that day must not be before the day on which section 241 comes into force (01.04.2020) see s. 269(4) — Not in force

— s. 251 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council, but that day must not be before the day on which section 252 comes into force (01.04.2020) see s. 269(5) — Not in force
— s. 270 (ss. 1 to 63) enacts the Security Screening Services Commercialization Act;

— ss. 14, 24 and 37 to 42 of the Security Screening Services Commercialization Act enacted by section 270, come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council — see s. 279(4) — Not in force

— ss. 16 to 23 and 44 to 46 and ss. 47(1) of the Security Screening Services Commercialization Act as enacted by s. 270, come into force on the transfer date, as defined in s. 2(1) of the Security Screening Services Commercialization Act see 279(1) — Not in force
— ss. 271 to 275, 277 and 278 come into force on the transfer date, as defined in s. 2(1) of the Security Screening Services Commercialization Act see s. 279(2) — Not in force
— s. 276 of this Act comes into force on the day fixed by order under s. 63 of the Security Screening Services Commercialization Act, as enacted by s. 270 — see s. 279(5) — Not in force

NOTE: The Minister of Transport must publish in the Canada Gazette a notice of the transfer date, as defined in subsection 2(1) of the Security Screening Services Commercialization Act, as soon as feasible after that date see s. 279(3) of the Budget Implementation Act No. 1 (2019, c. 29).
— ss. 292 (ss. 1 to 88) in force 09.12.2020 enacts the College of Immigration and Citizenship Consultants Act see s. 300(1) and SI/2020-73
— ss. 293 and 296(1) to (3) in force 23.11.2021, see Canada Gazette Part I, Vol. 155, No 33, page 4504
— ss. 294, 295 and 297 and s. 296(4) in force on assent 21.06.2020 see s. 300
— ss. 298 and 299 in force 23.11.2021, see Canada Gazette Part I, Vol. 155, No 33, page 4504
— Division 19 (s. 313), enacting the National Housing Strategy Act, in force 09.07.2019 see SI/2019-62
— Division 20, (s. 314) enacts the Poverty Reduction Act;
— ss. 9 to 12 of the Poverty Reduction Act, enacted by s. 314, comes in force 09.07.2019 see SI/2019-58;
— ss. 318 to 321 in force 05.07.2019 see s. 322
— ss. 323 to 326 in force 01.11.2019 see s. 327
— s. 334 comes into force 01.04.2021 see s. 335
— s. 336, which enacts the Department of Indigenous Services Act, in force 15.07.2019 see s. 336.1
— s. 337, which enacts the Department of Crown-Indigenous Relations and Narthern Affairs Act (ss. 1 to 20), in force 15.07.2019 see s. 337.1
— s. 387 edicted by Federal Prompt Payment for Construction Work Act (ss. 1 to 25) in force 09.12.2023 — see SI/2023-77
